name: BBDSZ Pénzügyi Ágazat Szakszervezeti Szövetsége
memberOrga: Trade Unions of Hungarian banks and insurance companies: BB Bank, MKB Bank, CIB Bank, K&H Bank, Aegon Insurance Company, Groupama Insurance Co., Unicredit.
goal: Represent and protect workers in the finance sector, that is in banks and insurance companies. And also temporary workers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Single market
euInitiatives: MIFID II, BASEL III, Impacts of the Basel III regulatory Framework, Retails Financial Services Action Plan, Financial Education and Consumer Protection, Digitalisation in the Financial Sector, Digitalisation and Working skills, Priips, CMU EU Personal Pension Framework, Social Europa, Artificial Intelligence
